snippet: Iran’s top intelligence official on Friday accused Germany and France of participating in what the Iranian authorities had previously described as an Israeli-British-American plot.
abstract: Iranian Intelligence Min Heidar Moslehi accuses Germany and France for the first time of participating in what Iranian authorities have described as an Israeli-British-American plot aimed at assassinating Iranian nuclear scientists; at least five nuclear scientists have been killed since 2007.
lead_paragraph: Iran’s top intelligence official on Friday accused Germany and France of participating in what the Iranian authorities had previously described as an Israeli-British-American plot.

headline.main: Iran: Intelligence Chief Expands List of Suspects
headline.print_headline: Iran: Intelligence Chief Expands List of Suspects
